com.salesforce.androidsdk.push

Class PushMessaging

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salesforce.androidsdk.push.PushMessaging

  • public class PushMessaging
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides utility functions related to push notifications, such as methods for registration, unregistration, and storage and retrieval of push notification registration information from a private shared preference file.
    Author:
    bhariharan, ktanna

    • Method Detail

      • register

        public static void register(Context context,
                            UserAccount account)
        Initiates push registration, if the application is not already registered. Otherwise, this method initiates registration/re-registration to the SFDC endpoint, in order to keep it alive, or to register a new account that just logged in.
        Parameters:
        context - Context.
        account - User account.

      • unregister

        public static void unregister(Context context,
                              UserAccount account,
                              boolean isLastAccount)
        Performs SFDC un-registration from push notifications for the specified user account. Performs GCM un-registration only if this is the last account being logged out.
        Parameters:
        context - Context.
        account - User account.
        isLastAccount - True - if this is the last logged in account, False - otherwise.

      • initializeFirebaseIfNeeded

        public static void initializeFirebaseIfNeeded(Context context)
        Will make call to Firebase.initializeApp if it hasn't already taken place.
        Parameters:
        context - Context

      • getAppNameForFirebase

        public static java.lang.String getAppNameForFirebase(Context context)
        Get the app unique name for firebase
        Parameters:
        context - Context
        Returns:
        appName String

      • registerSFDCPush

        public static void registerSFDCPush(Context context,
                                    UserAccount account)
        Initiates push registration against the SFDC endpoint.
        Parameters:
        context - Context.
        account - User account.

                                      UserAccount account)
        Initiates push un-registration against the SFDC endpoint.
        Parameters:

        account - User account.

      • getRegistrationId

        public static java.lang.String getRegistrationId(Context context,
                                                 UserAccount account)

        account - User account.

      • setRegistrationId

        public static void setRegistrationId(Context context,
                                     java.lang.String registrationId,
                                     UserAccount account)
        Stores the GCM registration ID, and resets back off time.
        Parameters:
        context - Context.
        registrationId - Registration ID received from the GCM service.
        account - User account.

      • isRegistered

        public static boolean isRegistered(Context context,
                                   UserAccount account)
        Returns whether the specified user account is currently registered or not.
        Parameters:
        context - Context.
        account - User account.
        Returns:
        True - if the user account is registered, False - otherwise.

        Returns:

        Parameters:
